The code iterates from 2*s to 1, decreasing by 1, and sets the value of inv[i-1] to inv[i]*i%mod.
The function comb is defined to return the product of fact[x]*inv[y]%mod*inv[x-y]%mod if x>=y>=0 else 0.
The variable ans is initialized to 0.
